short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect extension to PageProof. Letâ€™s make reviewing and approving creative work effortless.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageProof is a powerful online proofing tool that lets you gather feedback on your work.

Files of any kind  - PDF, Adobe CC, Microsoft Office, design prototypes from Figma, staging URLs, live website URLs, web banners, video, email templates and more - can be securely shared with your team in just a few clicks.

Learn more over at pageproof.com

Important note: The PageProof extension for Chrome only reads the website or HTML content which is running inside PageProof and does not read any other website data.
